module.name: OpenID
module.description: The module enables OpenID feature into the ATutor. Which enables users to register and log in to the ATutor without much pain. They can manage their content without keeping a separate username password combination. Enabling this module helps users to make use of Google, FaceBook and Twitter credentials for loging into the ATutor. The module is 100% configurable. The module allows admins to controll the way it should behave. For details refer the README file. Check docs/ for documentation and help.

release.notes: Please report bugs to the author. :)
